Name: All Dry
Brand Overview: All Dry Services is a property restoration franchise specializing in water damage and disaster recovery and cleanup services for homeowners and businesses. Founded in 2014 the company offers a recession-proof business model with 24/7 support and proven systems for scalable operations.

Name: Conquer Padel
Brand Overview: Conquer Padel Club is a premier sports franchise offering state-of-the-art indoor padel facilities designed for players of all skill levels. The brand capitalizes on padels explosive market growth with revenue from memberships and court rentals and coaching and tournaments and food and beverage services.

Name: DuraFleet
Brand Overview: DuraFleet is a mobile fleet repair franchise that brings maintenance and repair services directly to businesses relying on their vehicles. The franchise targets fleet owners seeking convenient DOT inspections and preventive maintenance and roadside assistance through a scalable home-based business model with low overhead.

Name: Heights Wellness Retreat
Brand Overview: Heights Wellness Retreat is a health and wellness franchise offering massage therapy and skincare and holistic wellness services in an upscale yet affordable environment. With 100+ locations and 95% customer retention the franchise features a recurring revenue model with 74% from memberships.

Name: Main Squeeze
Brand Overview: Main Squeeze Juice Co. is a health-focused franchise offering nutritionist-designed juices and superfood-inspired beverages with a mission of Making Healthy Easier. The franchise serves health-conscious consumers and provides comprehensive support with flexible location options for wellness-passionate entrepreneurs.

Name: Morelia Gourmet Paletas
Brand Overview: Morelia Gourmet Paletas is a Mexican-inspired frozen dessert franchise offering artisanal paletas with low startup costs and high profit margins. The brand appeals to entrepreneurs seeking a small-footprint business opportunity in the growing premium ice cream market with comprehensive franchisee support.

Name: MosquitoNix
Brand Overview: MosquitoNix is a nationwide pest control franchise offering custom outdoor insect misting systems and fogging treatments and seasonal holiday lighting services. The franchise appeals to entrepreneurs through its recurring revenue model and corporate-managed client acquisition and proprietary technology with mobile app monitoring.

Name: PatchMaster
Brand Overview: PatchMaster is a rapidly expanding low-cost franchise specializing in same-day drywall repair services for homeowners and trade professionals. With no brick-and-mortar requirements and comprehensive training support franchisees can reach profitability quickly while building flexible growth-oriented operations.

Name: Patrice & Associates
Brand Overview: Patrice & Associates is a staffing and executive search franchise specializing in the hospitality industry connecting top brands like Marriott and Hilton with qualified management candidates. The franchise offers proven recruiting processes and immediate client leads on day one and the ability to scale through hiring additional recruiters.

Name: Resting Rainbow
Brand Overview: Resting Rainbow is a pet memorial and cremation service franchise providing compassionate and dignified end-of-life care for beloved pets. The business serves pet owners and B2B clients including veterinary clinics offering a non-seasonal business with minimal staffing requirements in an underserved market.

Name: Service Experts
Brand Overview: Service Experts is one of the largest residential HVAC companies in the United States operating in 30+ states and serving approximately 2500 homes and businesses daily. The franchise offers protected territories and recurring revenue models and access to a national support network with comprehensive training.

Name: Taste Buds Kitchen
Brand Overview: Taste Buds Kitchen operates culinary experience centers offering cooking classes and birthday parties and corporate events and summer camps for ages 2-99. The franchise serves families and event planners seeking exceptional culinary entertainment experiences in upscale kitchen studios.

Name: Water Babies
Brand Overview: Water Babies is the worlds largest baby swimming franchise having taught over half a million children essential water safety and swimming skills since 2002. The franchise combines social impact with proven profitability offering multiple revenue streams and an award-winning global brand.
